document_data.name: Krak al-Zirad
document_data.location: [[City of Brass]], the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]]
document_data.source: [[Secrets of the Lamp|Secrets of the Lamp, Genie Lore]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''Krak al-Zinad''', or the '''Keep of Fire Striking Steel''', was a castle located in the [[City of Brass]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}

The Keep was located in the [[Cindersweeps]] ward of the city.
document_data.Activities: Krak al-Zinad housed soldiers that protected the harbors of the City of Brass. Additionally, all of the marines, and others who used specialized seaborne weaponry, were trained here.
